extendedInfo.description: Fantasy Football 2013 Release is here! Link your Fantasy Football teams from YAHOO, ESPN, CBS, NFL fantasy football providers to get injury alerts, lineup notifications and news catered for you! Any serious fantasy enthusiast should use this app. Fantasy Football Buzzer is the only app that lets you keep an eye on all your fantasy football teams in one place and read relevant news for players on your teams! With a simple to use user interface, you will find yourself right at home. --- Features --- Connect Yahoo, ESPN, CBS, NFL fantasy football teams with one click. Automatic notifications on NFL player injuries for your fantasy teamsAutomatic notifications on empty roster spots in your fantasy teamsRecommendations on who to pickup and who to trade in your fantasy leaguesNews catered to your players in your fantasy league(Disclaimer) FantasyBuzzer Inc is not affiliated to YAHOO, ESPN, CBS, NFL or any other fantasy sports provider in any way. For support, contact us at support@fantasybuzzer.com and we would be glad to answer your questions. Best of luck for the season, don't worry we got your back!What people are saying?âI've been playing around on the app. I really like it. I've played fantasy football for a while but never had a app like this where I could load all my teams and enjoy the informationâ- jwhitledge20âFall is a super busy time for me so I canât really focus on Fantasy Football. But with Fantasy Buzzer, instead of spending a couple of hours researching my team, I spent maybe 5 minutes adjusting my roster. Great app!â- Tom from IllinoisâFantasy Buzzer is probably the best Fantasy Football app out there! The buzzers and personal news really made managing my roster a breeze this season!â- Raidersman232

reviews.title: Quality app
reviews.comment: This is the best all in one fantasy football app there is. Great fantasy football app where all your teams come together. Would be cool if you could add the option to sign into yahoo via google account if you do not have yahoo id. Also would be cool to receive a free subscription :).
reviews.author: Michael Vanegeren

reviews.comment: Every time I tried to link to an ESPN account, it would say it connected and is downloading, before crashing. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: Tyler Stevens

reviews.title: Very Useful App
reviews.comment: Provides fast and useful updates directly related to the players on my fantasy football teams. As of today, the most useful/helpful app of its kind. Works great with my GalaxyS3.
reviews.author: nathan tish

reviews.title: Sigh
reviews.comment: Post draft wouldn\'t keep record of my yahoo teams. Kept saying sync\'d but nothing. Uninstalled
reviews.author: aaron grubby

reviews.title: Took a while but it\'s awesome
reviews.comment: Great app. I have ESPN and it works perfectly fine recommendations is awesome. Also I love how they have premium for free. Just by sharing. Not sure I wanna share it though ..  I don\'t want friends in my league to have any type if an edge. Hahha anywho. Awesome app. Download and if there is any issues ( which I had NONE ) just email them to fix it... Cuz it\'s worth it.
reviews.author: Cory Bartley

reviews.title: Could have been good
reviews.comment: Synced my team from espn but the recommendations dont match up with my actual players.   Every player it recomnended I trade I dont  actually own
reviews.author: hookem78748

reviews.title: Pointless
reviews.comment: Shows you your roster and nothing more. Gives you news and updates but can\'t see your match ups or point totals. It\'s pretty pointless, honestly why do they go through the trouble of creating such a catastrophe.
reviews.author: Greg Sokolik

reviews.title: Terrible!
reviews.comment: This app sucks! I drafted league and 5 hours later it still aint synced. Deleting asap!
reviews.author: james hagens

reviews.title: 3 based on potential
reviews.comment: It seems like itd be an awesome app.  I have nfl, espn, and yahoo leagues all added correctly. However espn league it sync with wrong roster.  Havent drafted for the other two yet so cant comment on those syncs.
reviews.author: Robert Huei

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Love:
reviews.author: Tealah Bodkin

reviews.title: Doesn\'t do anything.
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t pull my CBS fantasy team. The CBS ap is crap and I thought this would be helpful. I don\'t see it as so.
reviews.author: Elisabeth Mitchell

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: One word awesome
reviews.author: Faik Haxhiymeri

reviews.title: Seems 2 be working now
reviews.comment: Online works fine but it won\'t put my team on the app nore can I select and save my team. I put it all the players I have and couldn\'t save so I hit the back button and didn\'t save.....
reviews.author: joshua toseff

reviews.comment: Great App!
reviews.author: Austin Becker

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Great way to track your fantasy teams.
reviews.author: Brian Pincus

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: Syncs to both my fantasy leagues (espn and nfl)  and allows me to effortlessly monitor my players/teams status,  only wish I could manipulate the lineups from it than it would be the only fantasy football app I would ever need.
reviews.author: Patrick Phillips

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: Will not upload teams, do NOT install
reviews.author: jason b

reviews.title: Da Truth
reviews.comment: This app is da real deal
reviews.author: James Johns

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Great app,  but how do you put players on the bench?
reviews.author: allan spray

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Just crap.
reviews.author: B Johnson
